Uses of Package
ch.ethz.vizzly.cache

  • Packages that use ch.ethz.vizzly.cache 
    Package Description
    ch.ethz.vizzly
    This package includes the Java servlet, the output generation and the Vizzly state container.
    ch.ethz.vizzly.cache
    This package contains interface definitions and common functionalities for implementing a cache.
    ch.ethz.vizzly.cache.memory
    This package contains the implementation of a memory cache.
    ch.ethz.vizzly.cache.sqldb
    This package contains the implementation of a cache that stores aggregated data in a SQL database.
  • Classes in ch.ethz.vizzly.cache used by ch.ethz.vizzly 
    Class and Description
    CacheManager
    This class implements the actual caching strategy.
  • Classes in ch.ethz.vizzly.cache used by ch.ethz.vizzly.cache 
    Class and Description
    AbstractCache
    This class defines the interfaces that any cache implementation must follow.
    CacheConfiguration
    This class implements a simple data type for assigning a aggregation window length to a cache implementation
    CacheManager
    This class implements the actual caching strategy.
    CacheUpdateWorkerSynchronization
    This class synchronizes multiple, concurrently running worker threads that are used for continuously pulling new data.
  • Classes in ch.ethz.vizzly.cache used by ch.ethz.vizzly.cache.memory 
    Class and Description
    AbstractCache
    This class defines the interfaces that any cache implementation must follow.
  • Classes in ch.ethz.vizzly.cache used by ch.ethz.vizzly.cache.sqldb 
    Class and Description
    AbstractCache
    This class defines the interfaces that any cache implementation must follow.
